statements: SELECT * FROM debt_management;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debt_management ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, last_payment_date FROM debt_management WHERE payment_reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, last_payment_date FROM debt_management WHERE debt_amount > 5000;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debt_management WHERE last_payment_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debt_management WHERE debt_amount > 5000 ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM debt_management WHERE last_payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT debtor_name, last_payment_date FROM debt_management WHERE payment_reminder_sent = FALSE ORDER BY last_payment_date ASC;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, debt_amount, last_payment_date FROM debt_management WHERE debt_amount < 10000 AND payment_reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, last_payment_date FROM debt_management WHERE debtor_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY debtor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_reminders;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM payment_reminders WHERE debt_amount > 1000;
SELECT reminder_id, debtor_name, due_date FROM payment_reminders ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT debtor_name, collection_date, collection_message FROM collection_letters WHERE collection_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT debt_amount, debtor_name FROM payment_reminders WHERE debt_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM payment_reminders WHERE debt_amount > 1000 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM payment_reminders WHERE due_date <= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT reminder_id, debtor_name, debt_amount, due_date FROM payment_reminders WHERE debt_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY due_date;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, due_date FROM payment_reminders WHERE debtor_name LIKE 'J%' AND due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT letter_id, debtor_name, collection_date, collection_message FROM collection_letters WHERE collection_date >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentReminders;
SELECT debtor_name, amount_due FROM CollectionLetters WHERE amount_due > 1000;
SELECT reminder_id, payment_due_date FROM PaymentReminders ORDER BY payment_due_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT debtor_name FROM PaymentReminders;
SELECT debtor_name, communication_date, communication_type FROM CommunicationLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT debtor_name, payment_due_date, amount_due FROM PaymentReminders WHERE reminder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CollectionLetters WHERE amount_due > 5000 ORDER BY letter_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, communication_date, communication_type FROM CommunicationLog WHERE debtor_name LIKE 'J%' AND communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT debtor_name, amount_due FROM PaymentReminders WHERE payment_due_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT debtor_name, communication_type, communication_details FROM CommunicationLog WHERE communication_date >= '2021-09-01' AND communication_date <= '2021-09-30';
SELECT * FROM Debtors;
SELECT debtor_name, debtor_email FROM Debtors WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT communication_type, communication_date FROM Communications ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT letter_text FROM CollectionLetters WHERE letter_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reminder_text, reminder_date FROM PaymentReminders WHERE debtor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Debtors WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT reminder_id, debtor_id, reminder_text FROM PaymentReminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT debtor_id, COUNT(communication_id) AS total_communications FROM Communications GROUP BY debtor_id;
SELECT debtor_name, debtor_email FROM Debtors ORDER BY debtor_name DESC;
SELECT Debtors.debtor_name, CollectionLetters.letter_text FROM Debtors JOIN CollectionLetters ON Debtors.debtor_id = CollectionLetters.debtor_id;
SELECT * FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, debtor_id, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT name, email FROM debtors WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM collection_letters WHERE debtor_id = 3
SELECT id, message FROM reminders
SELECT * FROM collection_letters WHERE overdue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY letter_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT debtor_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY debtor_id HAVING total_payments > 5000
SELECT name, email, phone FROM debtors WHERE id = 5
SELECT reminder_date, message FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY log_date ASC
